title: Patch 6.17 Unspecified error
body: I have had problems with patch 6.17 for a week now and i would really like to know how to fix it. every time i try to update it gives me an error with the message unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information. I have tried everything but it just won't help

replies.body: I'd like to help, but will need more info!  The Unspecified Error can vary depending on when it's happening.  At what percent do you receive the error?  Or do you have a screenshot?  Let me know!

I get the error when i start the update

[Screenshot](http://imgur.com/xY75oPW)
